title: Chinese Destination and Event Management Company, Orientis DMC, to exhibit at London’s World Travel Market, November 2015
text:
Shows Chinese Destination and Event Management Company, Orientis DMC, to exhibit at London’s World Travel Market, November 2015 Chinese Destination and Event Management Company, Orientis DMC, to exhibit at London’s World Travel Market, November 2015 Details Category: Show Created   10:30 Chinese Destination Management company, Orientis has announced it will exhibit at the World Travel Market in London this coming November. The China DMC specialists will showcase their range of leisure and MICE services (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Events) on stand AS565 in the Asia hall. This will include offering further insight into a range of services, including private touring, tailor-made programs, luxury and high-end travel and company incentive programs and products. 
Orientis DMC guarantees to offer the widest range of unique itineraries, tours and experiences of any China destination management company, making its booth a must visit for industry professionals. Orientis’ tailor-made itineraries make planning a trip, conference or event abroad a hassle free experience, saving both time and money and ensuring delegates discover first hand some of the culture, heritage and beauty that makes any sojourn in China so exhilarating. Orientis’ philosophy of showcasing the best of China through high-quality, individually-tailored, and culturally comprehensive experiences runs through each of its services, whether it is assisting with an important meeting, organizing company travel benefit schemes or arranging bespoke, culturally authentic tours. This passion for sharing another side of China will take centre stage at World Travel Market. Orientis said, “We are delighted to be attending World Travel market in London this autumn and look forward to meeting delegates interested to learn more about the Orientis approach to MICE. We know that booking the destination is not always the issue but having specialists in the area of intended travel is the key to peace of mind for corporate and leisure travelers alike. As a specialist China DMC we possess the local knowledge to overcome any problems or issues that might arise, allowing our tour operators and travel agency clients to meet the unique needs of their customers, where we bridge the cultural gaps between east and west, facilitating communication and mutual understanding. “Each travel experience needs to be as unique as the individual. Everyone has different agendas. We offer something for everyone with an array of bespoke high quality experiences taking visitors to some of the most beautiful places in China; including those off the beaten track. Not only do we guarantee a booking service that is second to none, we take care of our travelers at their destination – we invite those attending World Travel Market to visit us to get a small taste of this undiscovered China, right in the heart of London.” One of the top event management companies in China and specialists in the Asian event and travel market, Orientis is the perfect partner for tour operators and event management companies expanding to the Asian market or wishing to cement relationships with Chinese counterparts. With one foot firmly on the ground in China, Orientis is a respected and experienced Chinese destination and event management company that bridges the linguistic and cultural gaps so often encountered on trips aboard. Orientis offers multi-lingual translators, tour guides, event venues, meeting spaces, hotel accommodation, sightseeing excursions, activities and entertainment. Committed to helping leisure and travel experts establish a presence in the rapidly expanding yet challenging Asian travel market, Orientis DMC extends an open invitation for industry specialists to request a meeting at the London exhibition. For further information, please visit Orientis DMC on stand number AS565. Related articles
